Does company have career managers for en: Yes ,  the  company  has  career  managers  for  engineers .
Does Company encrypt data in transit and: Yes ,  Company  encrypt s  data  in  transit  using  standard  Transport  Layer  Security  ( TLS   1 . 2 )  and  data  at  rest  using   256 -bit  Advanced  Encryption  Standard  ( AES - 256 ).  Database  backups  are  also  encrypted  at  rest .
